title: Main iwan of the mosque of Abu Bakr Mazhar al-Ansari
site: Mosque of Abu Bakr Mazhar Al-Ansari
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Mosq. Aboubakr Mazhar à Margoûch (le sanctuaire) No.168. Translation of photographer's description: Mosque of Aboubakr Mazhar at Margoûch (the sanctuary) No.168.
architectural-detail: arches; chain moldings; doors; iwans; mihrabs; minbars; qibla walls; windows
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Main iwan of the mosque of Abu Bakr Mazhar al-Ansari
